definition: norm/standard/standard of reference/base/base point/base line/benchmark/reference point/reference frame/criterion/data
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of

sentences.english: Finally we calculated standard land price of Han Cheng's commercial land in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 最终测算出2002年韩城市城区商业用地基准地价。

sentences.english: An united space datum line has been given.
sentences.chinese: 给出统一的空间基准线。

sentences.english: NOTE Data should be compared with those of competitors andor appropriate benchmarks .
sentences.chinese: 数据应该与竞争对手和或适当的基准的数据相比较。

sentences.english: TXT in your Fraps folder, and into the benchmark directory if you have detailed statistics enabled.
sentences.chinese: 并到基准的目录，如果您有启用详细的统计资料。

sentences.english: We have rewritten all the sample scripts to cover the new benchmark.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经重写了所有示例脚本，以覆盖新的基准。

sentences.english: This paper dwells the concepts of retrogressive aggradation and the datum of erosion.
sentences.chinese: 本文阐述了溯源淤积和侵蚀基准面的概念。

sentences.english: So far in this article, I have only considered microbenchmarks.
sentences.chinese: 在本文中，到目前为止只考虑了微基准测试。

sentences.english: "The assessment setting" annual fee pay proof.
sentences.chinese: “评估基准日”“年费交纳证明”用英文怎么说？

sentences.english: So, how do you write a perfect microbenchmark?
sentences.chinese: 那么，如何编写好的微基准呢？

sentences.english: Select csys, datum point or location as the reference for entering offsets.
sentences.chinese: 选取坐标系，基准点或位置作为偏移的参考。

sentences.english: A high accuracy band-gap reference voltage without resistor is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种高准确度无电阻的带隙基准电压源。

sentences.english: Protocols & benchmarks which will allow developers to compare performance & track system improvements.
sentences.chinese: 将允许开发者比较性能和磁道系统改进的协议和基准。

sentences.english: The results in this article came from benchmarks executed in a controlled environment.
sentences.chinese: 本文中的结果来自在一个控制环境中执行的基准。

sentences.english: The exchange rate had recently neared that point.
sentences.chinese: 最近的汇率水平已经接近此基准。

sentences.english: At last we make some characteristic waveform about this bandgap voltage reference.
sentences.chinese: 文中最后给出了此基准电压源的各种性能的仿真波形。

definition: to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
used in the construction 以...為例|以...为例, "to take ... as an example"
basis point (finance), abbr. to 基點|基点[ji1 dian3]
